function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Diminished UV intensity at height 1.8 m","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and calibration of UV equipment","Technologies":"UV intensity monitoring and control systems","People":"Animal handlers, researchers, and animals in the ward","Owner":"Facility management and maintenance staff"},{"Description":"High negative ion concentration in the ionizer enclosure","Impact":"Potential respiratory and health effects on occupants","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and limits on negative ion concentration","Technologies":"Ionizer performance monitoring systems","People":"Occupants and animals in the ionizer enclosure","Owner":"Facility management and maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Dust-related TB outbreak due to ionizer cleaning","Impact":"Increased risk of TB transmission and respiratory issues among animals","Mitigation":"Improved cleaning protocols and containment measures during ionizer maintenance","Technologies":"Dust collection systems and cleaning equipment","People":"Animal handlers, researchers, and animals in the affected area","Owner":"Facility management and maintenance staff"}]}
